content:
There are several ways you can support the work of Heifer International in empowering small-scale farmers around the world:

1. Donate: You can make a one-time or recurring donation to Heifer International through their website. Your donation will go towards supporting their programs and initiatives that empower small-scale farmers to improve their livelihoods and build sustainable communities.

2. Volunteer: Heifer International offers volunteer opportunities in the U.S. and abroad. You can help with events, fundraising, or support their programs in the field.

3. Fundraise: You can also raise funds for Heifer International by organizing your own fundraising event. This is a great way to involve your community and support a good cause.

4. Spread the word: You can help to raise awareness about Heifer International and their work by sharing their website and social media pages with your friends and family.

5. Shop in the Heifer Gift Catalog: Consider shopping for gifts that support Heifer International; their online gift catalog offers truly unique gifts that provide support for small-scale farmers and their communities around the world.

Overall, there are many ways to support the work of Heifer International and make a positive impact in the lives of small-scale farmers around the world.
